ISSUE.TITLE: rethinkdb.service
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/docker pull rethinkdb:2.3 ...... ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run --rm \ ...... rethinkdb:2.1.5 \ ...... For "rethinkdb:2.1.5", read "rethinkdb:2.3"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Update sass-loader. It was giving compile errors.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix inconsistent RethinkDB version in deployment docs. Fixes #385.
